definitions.text: a period of the year marked by special events or activities in some field
examples: he celebrated his 10th season with the ballet company
she always looked forward to the avocado season

definitions.text: one of the natural periods into which the year is divided by the equinoxes and solstices or atmospheric conditions
examples: the regular sequence of the seasons

definitions.text: a recurrent time marked by major holidays

examples: Season the chicken breast after roasting it
This trip will season even the hardiest traveller

definitions.text: make more temperate, acceptable, or suitable by adding something else; moderate
